choices: Laharl, Flonne, Etna, and Hanako's
Adel, Rozalin, Yukimaru and Taro's
A non-Disgaea world (But still Nippon Ichi)
Mao, Rasylberry, and Almaz's (Disgaea 3)
Valvatorez's (Disgaea 4)
1.content: Which of the following Netherworlds will we go to? IE Which characters are going to gain?
1.title: Which Netherworld Are We Visiting?

choices: They all go out to eat
The Prinnies see this as a chance for revenge
Mid-Boss shows up for no reason (I'M THE DARK ADONIS VYERS!!!)
They hire a specialist in gluttony
Etna recalls a treasure that could help them
11.content:
"Hey! What's this?" asked Laharl, as the child-like demon Overlord sat on his throne. He was reading an issue of Rolling Brimstone. "It says here that gluttony is the new wrath,"

"Rolling Brimstone is always right, Lord Laharl," said Hanako, the bat-winged child who was Etna's new vassal and Demon Lord in training.

"It says any skinny demon should be shunned by society as a pansy," said Flonne, the fallen angel looking over Laharl's shoulder.

"You idiots will believe anything," said Etna, the Demon Beauty Queen laying on her side as Prinnies brought her food.

"But Etna...wouldn't gaining weight add some to your flat chest?" asked Hanako.

"Grr..." went Etna, before she realized Hanako had a point. "Hmm...ok, I'm in,"

"Me too! I want a big chest and noticible ass too!" went Hanako.

"I could be like one of my monster movie heroes: Gourgeo the Giant Ball of Fat!" smiled Flonne.

"I'LL BE THE FATTEST, MOST BIGGEST OVERLORD EVER!!!" went Laharl.
11.title: Laharl, Flonne, Etna, and Hanako's

choices: Laharl ends up the biggest
Flonne ends up the biggest
Etna ends up the biggest
111.content:
Soon...

The trio was at a popular restuarant called Glumoth's House of XXXL Portions. Glumoth was a giant blob demon who knew all about real meals and he didn't object to letting them in for free (especially after Laharl threatened to flip the restaurant upside down and burn it to ashes).

"Ok...so what will you be having?" asked Glumoth, being the personal waiter for the trio at the best table.

"Give me the 'Add Multiple Xs' all you can eat special for me," said Laharl, reading the menu.

"I'll have 'Become a Blob like Glumoth' buffet combo," said Flonne.

"And I want the 'Start Adding Chairs for my Growing Butt' platters," said Etna.

"I'll take the Biggie Kiddie meal," grinned Hanako.

"Coming right up!" smiled Glumoth. Soon, their food came and the trio started pigging out...
111.title: Glumoth's House of XXXL Portions

choices: The Prinnies prepare a "special" meal
The Prinnies do even more labor to keep the four on their growing butts all day
The Prinnies retrieve a special artifact
112.content:
Little did Laharl or his trio of maidens know, they were being spied on by the Prinnies. Prinnies were those who died from a life of major sin, and had the form of undead winged peguins. They were constantally forced into slavery by demons, and this group in pactilar was especially abused.

"Did you hear that, doods?" went Prinny #1.

"That pain-in-the ass Overlord wants to become a lard-ass, dood," said Prinny #2.

"This could be our chance, doods!" went Prinny #3. The prinnies did not know what was worst: Laharl ordering them to clean the whole castle again just as they finish it, Etna's tossing them around to make them explode for the fun of it, or Flonne and Hanako's growing cruetly to them as they make them do embarrassing tasks.

"OH!!! I can't stand being in another of Flonne's 'Bash the monster' games!" shouted #2.

"Especially since we're always the monster, doods!" shouted #3.

"We finally could get back at them for all they do to us, dood," said #1, "We'll fatten them until they can't even fit in their rooms anymore, and then we can do whatever we like, and they'll be too fat to move!"

"YEAH!!!" went the Prinnies in unison.

"Plan: Fatten all those ungrateful slave drivers is a go!" shouted Prinny #2.
112.title: The Plotting Prinnies

choices: Laharl eats the chocolate all by himself and gains a lot of weight
Laharl splits the chocolate between himself and the girls
Laharl eats the chocolate...CLEAR THE WAY!!!!
113.content:
"Oh-ho!"

All eyes looked up to see a dark-haired man in a black outfit with his chest showing.

"What is this moi hears?" asked the man.

"Buzz off, Mid-Boss," said Laharl.

"I'm the Dark Adonis! My name is Vyers!!! DARK ADONIS VYERS!!!" shouted Mid-Boss (Hey! Don't call me that, writer!)

(Screw you! You're Mid-Boss, and you'll like it!)

"Uh? Why are you here?" asked Laharl, blinking.

"Moi is here for another rematch, Laharl! Today, I will defeat you and become the Overlord!" shouted Mid-Boss, before something fell out of his pocket.

"Hey, what's this?" asked Laharl, picking it up. It was a bar of chocolate marked, "Super Weight Gain Bar,"

"Oh-ho! Why don't you eat it?" chuckled Mid-Boss.

"...You realize the Prince WANTS to gain weight?" asked Etna, "Plus...it's kind of too obvious..."
113.title: Mid-Boss Arrives (DARK ADONIS VYERS!!!!)

choices: They all grow amazingly plump
They all become downright obese
They all become immobile blobs
1132.content: "Alright, let's divide it up," said Laharl, breaking the chocolate into four equal pieces for himself, Etna, Flonne, and Hanako. They all eat the chocolate and await the results...
1132.title: Splitting Up the Chocolate

choices: The girls comply and take pleasure in feeding Laharl
The girls rebel and kidnap Laharl to steal the fat in his body
One year later...Laharl is his own Netherworld
1133.content:
GULP!!!

Laharl gulped down the chocolate, and said, "Not bad..." Suddenly, his stomach began to rumble before growing! Every part of Laharl was growing into a blob!

"RUN!!!" shouted Etna, before she, Hanako, Flonne, and Mid-Boss evacuated the castle. Laharl's fat filled the hallways and he grew and grew until he bursted out of his castle. He kept growing and growing until the point he was now as big as his former castle.

"HA-HA-HA-HA! I DID IT!!!!" laughed Laharl, his giantic body jiggling.

"He did..." went Etna, looking up to the gigantic Overlord.

"More!!!! I demand more food!!!" ordered Laharl.
1133.title: CLEAR THE WAY!!!!

choices: They became so fat, they orbit around Laharl as his moons
They rule his former Netherworld as obese rulers
11333.content:
One year later...

"Here you are, Master Laharl," smiled a busty and tubby nekomata girl as she held out food.

Laharl's shapeless fat head smirked and he happily ate what was given to him. Over the past year, he continued eating tons and tons of food.

Laharl had eventually grown so fat, he had to leave his Netherworld to become his own. Castles and towns were build on his fat, a massive fortress around his head.

But what became of Etna, Flonne, and Hanako?
11333.title: Netherworld Laharl

choices: Books on gaining plans
A kitchen and supplies! (Her fat acts as hammerspace!
You decide
114.content:
The next day...

"Guten morgen!" smiled a very fat succubus demoness as she waddled into the palace. She wore a very tight outfit of the succubi, and her giganrtic breasts bounced on her enormous belly as it jiggled.

"Wow...this must be the gluttony expert," said Flonne, she, Laharl, Etna, and Hanako watching the living ball of fat waddle in.

"Ja, ja! Ich bin Fooda! I'm here to make de kinder nice and fett!" smiled the the succubi.

"Well, we have to keep with the trends after all," said Laharl.

"Remeber when envy was the hit item? Laharl stole stuff from everyone!" smirked Etna.

"Hey! An Overlord has to be the most chrismatic of his people!" shouted Laharl, eyes turning orange-yellow and his attenae standing up.

Fooda laughed and said, "Do not worry, Herr Laharl...you and your freuden will make Fooda look skinny in no time," She reached into her fat folds and pulled out...
114.title: Fooda-The Gluttony Specialist

choices: She orders her servants to cook a buffet's worth of food
Rozalin orders out from a bunch of places
Rozalin looks for a spell among her false father's books
The others are interested in gluttony as well
Something else happens
12.content:
It had been some time since the fake Overlord Zenon had been defeated and Rozalin had become Overlord of her world. Though many of the humans had changed back, there were still many demons. However, none of them seemed acceptant of Overlord Rozalin.

"I don't get it. Why aren't anyone listening to me?" asked the blonde and busty Rozalin, as the demoness recieved messages of rejected orders.

"Search me," said Adel, Rozalin's boyfriend and a demon-hunting demon.

"Don't worry. You still have me, Princess," said Taro, as he shined one of Rozalin's shoes.

"I believe I have the answer, zam,"

"WHOA!!!" went Adel, leaping back. "Haven't seen you in a while, Yukimaru,"

"Indeed, Sir Adel, zam," said Yukimaru, the little ninja holding a magazine which she gave to Rozalin.

"Rolling Brimstone?" asked Rozalin, as she opened it. "What the?" she asked, as she read an article.

"What is it, Princess?" asked Taro.

"It says gluttony has become a major trendy sin in the netherworld. Demons are actually refusing to listen to Overlords who aren't following the trend, saying they're uncool to follow," said Rozalin, "And I'm on the list of uncool Overlords!"

"Just because you don't devote yourself to mass eating?" asked Adel.

"Well, that's going to be different!" shouted Rozalin.
12.title: Trouble With the New Ruler

choices: The Prinnies finish the meal
Rozalin gets interested in eating Prinny meat
The gang gets another visitor: Axel
121.content:
"Prinnies!" ordered Rozalin, before a bunch of blue peguins with tiny bat-wings and wooden pegs for legs came swarming into the chamber.

"You called for us, dood?" asked one of the Prinnies.

"Yes. I wish for a buffet worth of food. And I want it good and quick," said Rozalin.

"Right away, dood!" shouted another Prinny, before they swarmed out.

"I don't really like using, Prinnies, Rozalin," said Adel.

"Prinnies are good and cheap labor, Adel. Plus they have no choice. Doing labor is the only way they can redeem themselves from their wicked former lives and pass on during the Red Moon," explained Rozalin.
121.title: Prinnies: Cheap and Effective Labor

choices: Rozalin gets full and can't finish
Rozalin finishes it all
Rozalin is interrupted mid-meal
1211.content:
"Um are sure you can eat all this?" Adel questioned as he observed the humongous meal laid out for Rozalin.
"You underestimate me Adel." Rozalin said casually as she began to dig into her food.
While Adel was certain Rozalin's determination was genuine he still didn't think she'd be able to put away the buffet worth of food in front of her.
1211.title: The Prinnies finish the meal

choices: Rozalin goes to lie down and digest her meal.
Someone new shows up.
12112.content:
Adel was astonished at Rozalin's accomplishment she had Woofed down a whole buffet worth of food.
"Oof." Rozalin groaned as she leaned back against her throat bloated from her massive meal. She rubbed her swollen stomach and groaned
12112.title: Rozalin finishes it all

choices: Rozalin found a spell that creates an instant WG potion
Rozalin found a spell that makes all the targets eat turn into fat
Rozalin found an instant blob spell
123.content:
Soon..

"Why are you here?" asked Adell, as he found Rozalin digging through the fake Zenon's spellbooks.

"There must be something that imposter had that could help. After all, he did create the spell that turned Veldime's residents into demons," explained Rozalin, putting a book down and cracking open another. She looked through it, before eventually going, "Ah! Here we go!!!"
123.title: Hitting the Books

choices: The four go out to eat
They order out from "Blobby McKing's Sumo Food Hut,"
Skip to five weeks (and hundreds of pounds later)
124.content:
"Wait, you're going to do this?" asked Adel, surprised.

"I have to maintain order in my Netherworld, Adel. Besides...I'm a demon, and I have to follow whatever sin is in. You do too...you're a demon too," said Rozalin.

"Yeah...but..." began Adel, before a bell came off. It was a summons for his demon hunting; a rouge demon was at it again. "I'll be back," he said, leaving.

"Wow..." thought Taro, trying to imagine Rozalin all fat. He thought she would look cute, and started wondering about being fat himself. Taro smiled at the thought of being so huge and soft, and that no one would be able to push him around at that size.

"Hmm...gaining, huh, zam..." thought Yukimaru, as she pictured herself doing it. It made her remeber a moment from her life where she told her father she wanted to become a sumo wrestler, not a ninja, but he wouldn't hear of it.

"May I join you, Princess?" asked Taro.

"Me too, zam!" went Yukimaru.

"Sure!" smiled Rozalin, before they began making plans. Shortly after, Adel returned, slightly beaten up and worn out. "What happened to you?"

"Demon...way too big..." went Adel, "Apparently, he's been...following that gluttony trend...way too fat for my fists to hurt..."

"Appears that many demons may have too much of a weight advantage for you to defeat them..." smiled Rozalin.

"Fine...guess I have to put on some too..." said Adel.
124.title: The others are interested in gluttony as well

choices: The realm of Zetta and his gang (Makai Kingdom)
Haephnes where an nameless hero/heroine, Gig, Danette, Tricia, Vitali, and Juno
None of these are right. Other worlds to see...
13.content: We're still in the same universe, but not Disgaea
13.title: A non-Disgaea world (But still Nippon Ichi)

choices: "Overlord Zetta gets his body back...but it weighs over 600 lbs,"
"Pram suddenly becomes so fat, she's a new Netherworld for Zetta"
Something Else
131.content:
"Ugh!!! Pram! I am growing impatient!!!" shouted Overlord Zetta, as he floated in space. He had lost his body when his Netherworld disappeared (no thanks to his stupidity of burning the Sacred Tomb). Now Zetta was trapped in the form of a book, acting as the new Sacred Tomb.

"Relax," smiled Pram, the white haired young oracle floating alongside him. Suddenly, a huge power was felt and a young man appeared out of nowhere. "Wait!!! You're not..."

"Ah, yes...I ran into someone who mentioned the great Overlord Zetta had been reverted into a book," smiled the young man, long brown hair down his back and wings like a dragon. He had a skinny tail, and wore a black overcoat with red clothes underneath. "Allow me to introduce myself, I am Overlord Tarus,"

"I never heard of you," said Zetta.

"But of course...I'm up and coming in the Overlord business. But I digress...you need a powerful demon to write wishes into your book to restore your Netherworld, correct?" asked Tarus.

"You don't look that strong...but go ahead," said Zetta, opening up. Tarus took the talking book into his hands and held out a pen.

"Strange...why do I get the feeling he's hiding something?" thought Pram.

What does he write?
131.title: Overlord Tarus's Wish

choices: The World of Phantom Brave
The World of La Pucelle
None of these worlds fit. Any others?
133.content: There are others worlds to visit...
133.title: Other Worlds

choices: Marona.
Castile.
Someone else.
1331.title: The World of Phantom Brave

choices: The world of Rhaspody: A Musical Adventure
The world of GrimGrimore
More choices
1333.title: Others?

choices: Just Valvatorez
One of his allies
All of them
Someone from Disgaea 5
15.content: Well, should it about JUST Valvatorez, should it have to do with his allies, Fenrich, Fuka, Desco, Emizel, Artina, all of them, or someone from Disgaea 5?
15.title: Valvatorez's (Disgaea 4)

info.brief_description: Your favorite demons/heros of Nippon Ichi are about to super-size it!
info.description:
Gluttony has become a trendy sin in the Nippon Ichi multi-verse, and many demons and heroes are about to take it up.

Rules:
1: No killing off characters.
2: Yaoi and Yuri are allowed
3: No sexual scenes (We have younger people here too)
